cancel.title: Confirm Cancel Import
cancel.message: Are you sure you want to cancel the import?

checkbox.ariaLabel: to include %{bookName} book in the import

withReaders.label:
If you choose to overwrite, the current book will be replaced with the new one.

If you choose to merge, the new book's audio tracks will be combined with the existing book, replacing any overlapping readers with the new ones.

noReaders.label:
This book is already on your device.

If you select it, the current book will be replaced with the new one.

partial.label:
This book is already on your device.

Since this file only contains audio, the new audio tracks will be merged with the existing book, replacing any readers that already exist.

withReaders.label:
This book is not on your device.

If you select it, the book and any chosen readers will be installed.

noReaders.label:
This book is not on your device.

If you select it, the book will be installed.

partial.label:
This file only contains audio, and the book isn't installed on your device.

Please install the full book file first before importing this audio file.

existingBookStrategy.ariaLabel: select what import strategy to use for book %{bookName}

merge.label: merge
merge.ariaLabel: merge the book %{bookName} by adding new readers and overwriting existing readers with new readers

checkbox.ariaLabel: to include reader %{readerDisplayName} in the import

existingBookReaderTooltip.label:
This reader is already part of the installed book.

If you select this user, the existing reader's data/audio will be replaced.

toasts.importAlreadyInProgress: import already running, try again later
